title: 145: Read Our Auras with Mystic Michaela!
itunes:title: 145: Read Our Auras with Mystic Michaela!
description:
The Broads are joined by the fantastic Megan aka Mystic Michaela (aura reader and psychic medium)! She chats all about what an aura actually is, when she started seeing “colors”, and uses your Bachelor Nation favorites to explain the different auras. She then dives into Bekah and Jess’ auras, their significant other’s, and daughter’s auras - it gets pretty personal, Broads. And lastly Megan does a mini aura reading for two members of the #broadsquad! 
ABOUT MYSTIC MICHAELA: 
https://www.mysticmichaela.com
PODCAST: https://www.mysticmichaela.com/podcast
READINGS: https://www.mysticmichaela.com/readings
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/mysticmichaela/
CHATTY BROADS INSTAGRAM:
Chatty Broads: @chattybroads
Bekah: @bekah
Jess: @thebaddmom 
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS:

*** HISMILE: Go to www.hismileteeth.com to shop their range of products and enter the code CHATTY at checkout for 20% off!
